review: I have to say I won this and didn't purchase the item.  My TV sits about 8 feet from my wireless router.  My laptop is about 5 feet away.  First installation, it knocked my wireless router off and took over as the main router for everything.  Took about 3 minutes to reset that and had everyone reconnect to the network.  Easy fix, but it was pain not knowing why I suddenly had not wifi in the house.The only thing I can stream is Youtube.  I tried streaming from my laptop and it runs great the fisrt 2 minutes, then the screen freezes but the audio continues to go along as if nothing is wrong.  I've tried to fix this but I can't seem to make it work with streaming videos from my laptop.  The upside of streaming Youtube from my S4 is that I can create a play list and leave it alone or add new videos.  This works great for thinks like Nerd Machine panel interviews that run an hour long.  Once in a while it will drop the network connection.I have a roku plugged into my tv, plus an xbox, and HD attentna.  I have no problems with my roku connection and can stream movies from amazon prime no problem, netflix no problem.  I've read some reviews that says the roku box can cause interference, but the two are not next to each other and the roku is off when I'm using the Chromecast.  I'll try disconnecting the roku this weekend, if that's the cause, it will be disappointing because the roku is used more than the chromecast.Finally got it working and loving it.  I don't use it much but it has been useful.
author: twister411 "twister411"

review: Great affordable way to watch netflix and Google Play with friends. I only wish that google would continue to roll out support for the rest of its applications, (media stored in drive, etc). Excited for Pandora Radio and other third party clients to begin using the hardware. Super easy to use and much cheaper than the alternatives.
author: Barry Travis

review: This is a great gadget - especially for $35. Would highly recommend to anyone who does not have WiFi enabled devise connected to their TV.Only complaint I have is that when I used the USB port as the source of power (on my Sharp Aquos TV), the pictures often got fuzzy.  It did not happen all the time, but it was annoying enough, that I used the provided power adapter instead.  Since then I have had no problems.
